Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He takes his first step toward the opening when he hears Condor's cry 
for help.  He stops and looks back finally locating his dying comrade.  He 
surveys the damage before receiving the orders to pursue Flicker.  He growls 
incomprehensibly coming to the realization that there is nothing more he can 
do he turns and takes to the air after Flicker.

--part1_6a.2f49e10a.2bb609aa_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
